name: The Door
contact: 1)Visit the office on the 3rd floor of The Door anytime Monday through Friday from 2 p.m. – 5 p.m. OR 2)Call 212-941-9090, ext. 3280. If no one answers the phone, please leave a message and speak slowly, clearly and leave a phone number where we can call you back. Say your name and phone number twice so we can be sure to get the right information

name: Catholic Charities Immigration Services
address: 80 Maiden Lane, 13th floor, New York, NY 10038
contact:
Consultations provided on Thursdays (except holidays), on a first- come, first-serve basis, depending on capacity. 

Please arrive by 8am. 

Low Consultation Fees ($50 -$85) are reduced or waived for those unable to pay.

name: Human Rights First
address: 75 Broad St, 31st Floor, New York, NY 10004
contact: If you are interested in our legal help in the New York City area, please come to our office at 75 Broad Street, 31st Floor, New York, NY 10004. Walkin hours are on Thursdays, 12:30pm to 3:30pm. After we review the information that you share about your case, we will contact you to schedule an intake interview with our staff or to refer you to other legal service organizations that might be able to help. If you are in New York or New Jersey and have questions, please call (212) 845-5200.

name: Safe Horizon
contact:
To reach the Immigration Law Project, please call: 718-943-8632, Se Habla Espanol. 

ILP operates Mon. – Fri. 9:00 a.m.- 5:00 p. m. 

If you reach our answering machine, please let us know when it is safe to call you back.

If you cannot talk during these hours, exceptions can be made to talk at a later time.
